pr_title: Use default scopes for foci request

timeline.message: Use default scopes for foci request

timeline.bodyText:
There's a minor refactor/code-sharing opportunity we should take here.... Looks like we have defined two constants for this, would be great not to trip over this in the future because there are two fields.....
The first is here (which you've used).
The second is in BaseController -- can we make sure all the same constants are used everywhere in the code so if we change which scopes comprise the defaults we only have to do it in one place?
I would probably add a static method to the BaseController to return the contents of the list with a " " delimiter.
Seem OK?
timeline.author: iambmelt
